alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 5:11PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms near Kettle Butte moving east towards Roberts and Osgood through 600 PM MDT... At 506 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Southeast Inl to 16 miles northeast of Taber. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Moderate to brief heavy rain, wind gusts to 35 mph, half inch hail, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Motorists traveling along Highway 20 and Interstate 15 west and north of Idaho Falls should be prepared for water on roadways and possible hydroplaning. Locations impacted include... Northern Idaho Falls, Iona, Ucon, Southeast Inl, Osgood and Kettle Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If traveling along the Highway 20 and Interstate 15, consider slowing down. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain
